name: Funny ColorPages
description:
Funny ColorPages now have 100+ coloring pages in your pocket. You and your kid will have lots of fun for hours!

* ZOOM function to color tiny details. Also have double click for fast zoom in.
* UNDO function to make sure you can always revert changes you have made.
*COLOR PICKER will allow you to select just the right color.
*Two way of painting - solid fill and gradient fill.
*Export your images for continues using.
*Relaxing build in music.
